body.name: 7 Inch Full Bed Frame No Box Spring Need, Low Profile Metal Platform Full Size Bed Frame, Heavy Duty Support Bedframes Full, Easy Assembly
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 18 mins
features: No Box Spring Needed: Reliable steel slats are matched to your memory foam, latex or spring mattress, and you no need a boxing spring to extend the life of your mattress by using our metal full bed frame.

Heavy Duty Support: Durable full size metal bed frame with 9 sturdy legs structure will support a maximum weight up to 3,500 lbs and provide you a good sleep time with no sagging, non-shake, no squeak and noise free.
Low Profile:The 7 inch platform full bed frame height is friendly for those who like to sleep close to the ground, and you can put box spring or not.
Easy Assembly: All hardware, instructions and tools have included in the package, and you can easy install this full size steel bed frame in few minutes.

Non slip and non scratches: All legs are installed with anti slip plastic foot pads to prevent the floor from scratches. The finish installed bed frame full size: L74.6"x W53.6"x H7", and for Mattress Size: L75"x W54".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This 18 inch bedframe is a tank!
reviews.reviewText: Edit 12/7/23: Still solid as a rock. Very little frame movement when repositioning one's self while sleeping. My mattress did slide around a little, so I bought several metal mattress gaskets. They attached to the frame easily, and now there's absolutely no mattress slide.My original review from August 2023: I am really impressed with this bedframe, so far. It was a breeze to build alone, and I didn't need to use my own tools. The bedframe looked great when I was done, but it was simply hilarious when I placed my mattress on the frame. It is TALL. Frankly, it looks a bit ridiculous, but the extra storage is amazing. I can fit a bunch of storage bins under this thing. Please consider the height of the 18 inch frame plus the height of your mattress before ordering.The bedframe arrived in a surprisingly compact box, for which I was grateful.Please note: this bedframe is just about designed for stubbed toes, with its legs placed directly under the sides. Foam padding for baby-proofing a home is a simple solution. That's what I did after my stubbed my toe the first time.No regrets. Sturdy and solid, and no bedframe noises from moving repositioning one's self in bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars pretty good, a few minor complaints
reviews.reviewText: firstly i want to say that it was very easy to put together. the instructions were very clear and straightforward. i was able to put it together using the little tools its came with. but my one complaint is that i wish there were a bottom piece blocking the slats from sliding out of the bottom. after screwing everything together, you push the slats into little small compartments but if you push too hard you’ll push it out of the bottom and be at square one. other than that, very sturdy and i do recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together. Ordered a king frame. Put it together in 20-30 minutes on my own. Very sturdy, bars haven’t bent or broken. Has held up super great over the past month. No squeaking noise at all. I’m 1000% satisfied with this purchase. Exceeded my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and simple
reviews.reviewText: The frame was very easy to assemble. It is much sturdier than I expected. I'm glad I made the choice to get this. 16" was just the right height to store things under the bed, and not be too high to get on the bed. Although, with a 12" memory foam mattress, im not able to sit on the bed and have my feet touching the ground, but I'm fine with it. I use my bed to lay in primarily, and not to sit on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some helpful tips
reviews.reviewText: PROS:--Easy to put together, sturdy, low profile, simple/minimalistic design, inexpensive (exactly what I was looking for)CONS:--The mattress slips from side to side. I had to purchase Non-Slip Mattress Gaskets from Amazon to keep the mattress on the frame. It works like a charm.--You're going to stub your toe on the "legs". Easy fix - I purchased 1-inch pipe insulation (looks like a black pool noodle) from a home improvement store (sprinkler section). It was about $4. Cut it with scissors and wrap it around the legs. It looks great and is covered by the comforter. It also saves you from adding money to the swear jar. And when you do kick it, it feels like you've just kicked a stuffed animal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit and value
reviews.reviewText: Item is sturdy and a good replacement for your box spring. It has alot of underbed space for storage and you can buy extra accessories to connect it to your headboard and footboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy no Chinese wood stain odars
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy I just wish I realized how tall 18" is with 16" mattress I wish I purchased 14" or 12" but no Chinese wood stain odars that we had from Bob's furniture we had to sell the odars was so bad headaches so for $80 not $1000dollars I'm very happy just need to find a big bed skirt. And if you have hardwood floors you will need felt pads and something padded to build frame on May Jesus Christ bless Everyone 🙏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to put together and I love the height. It is also very comfortable.
